answers.answer: Sorry I have never had to do this. If you don't mind asking what is it for??

I did it like 12 times with my first and it ended me up getting induced at 37 weeks because my protein kept going up along with my bp. I haven't had to do a single one this pregnancy and I'm 30 weeks.
I ended up having preeclampsia & got induced the next day.

I had to do the same thing at 35 weeks, its to see if you have an infection in your urine. My dr said if results came out positive he would have to deliver me that day, which they did come out positive and i am now 38 weeks and he still didnt deliver me. I guess it depends on what your dr wants to do
And if you don't already know you'll have to get blood drawn when you return the jug so be prepared.

They took blood before they have me the jub.. But I will have to give more??... And she started me on this because my blood pressure keeps going up and down on top of protein in my urine.. Buy I'm only 29 weeks I don't need to be induced just yet.. This has me scared now!

You should be fine with the blood. You just have to have a fresh sample within 24hrs of them getting the jug back. And they'll probably have you do a few more before but if your protein keeps going up you'll be induced early but probably not until full term at 37 weeks unless it's super life threatening. I did a ton of these because I only have 1 kidney so I always had protein in my urine but it kept increasing and my blood pressure would rise in minutes so my dr didn't like it.

i did not need a test, but i pee in a jug everyday since the hormone can be extracted and used to help other couples get pregnant. Its very normal in the Netherlands and you get used to it :) small effort, but much appreciation

question: Has anyone else had to do the 24 hour Urine collection!?... Omg!! It's gross and it's getting on my last nerves ! Wish it was a easier way them to have to keep pulling the pan out peeing and then pouring it into the jug that has to be kept in the fridge!!! If u have been thru this before how did ur test results turn out?
title: Peeing In Jug... Tmi .. Sorry!
